name: Robert Mondavi Winery x Bernardaud Collection

metadata.name: Geneviève Janssens | 1 of 655
metadata.description:
Napa Valley icon Robert Mondavi Winery offers a limited-edition NFT in partnership with Limoges porcelain house Bernardaud and generative artist Clay Heaton. Each token unlocks redemption of one of 1,966 porcelain 1.5L wine bottles holding custom wine blends from Napa Valley’s legendary To Kalon® Vineyard, a unique piece of digital art inspired by the wines and bottles, exclusive winery experiences, and insider access to future offerings.

21+ Only. Please enjoy our wines responsibly.

© 2022 Robert Mondavi Winery, Oakville, CA.

[Terms and Conditions apply.](https://nft.robertmondaviwinery.com/pages/nft-terms-of-service)
